Name: Keeper of the Eldflame

Actions.Name: Quickening
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 has their embers stirred up. At the end of their next turn, they explode, dealing 2 piercing damage once for every ember they are holding in a blast 1 area effect centered on them. They then become vulnerable.

Actions.Name: Light the Everforge
Actions.Description: The Keeper gains vigor 1 and summons the Everforge, a 2x2 height 2 object. Character standing on the forge when it is summoned are pushed up on top of it. The Forge has 10 hp plus 10 per player character and is automatically hit by attacks. The Smith may use any of the Forge actions below as long as the Forge is active and the Keeper is within range 2. When the Keeper uses Forge, the area on and adjacent to the forge explodes for a 2 piercing damage area effect, and the forge takes 10 damage, potentially destroying it.

ListedItems.Description: The Keeper can only keep one of each unique effect active at once, including the forge itself.
When a Forge effect ends, create a space of quicksilver adjacent to the Keeper.

ExtraActions.Name: Forge Weapon
ExtraActions.Description: The Keeper gains vigor 1 and forges a godly weapon, granting it a new ability. When the ability is used, the weapon is destroyed, ending this effect. Only one weapon form can be active at once until the weapon is used.

ExtraActions.Name: Forge Shield
ExtraActions.Description: The Keeper forges a massive shield, gaining vigor 1, cover from all directions and dodge. At the end of the round, they throw the shield, forcing a foe in range 8 to save or become stunned and shoved 3, destroying the shield and ending this effect.

ExtraActions.Name: Forge Helm
ExtraActions.Description: The Keeper gains vigor 1 and becomes unstoppable until the end of the round. The helm shatters at the end of the round, ending this effect.

ExtraActions.Name: Forge Armor
ExtraActions.Description: The Keeper gains vigor 2 and gains resistance. The armor shatters at the end of the round, ending this effect.

PhasesDescription: The Keeper changes phases when bloodied.

Phases.Description: Forge actions and Lighting the Everforge no longer end turn.
